intro: I'm open to collaboration, consulting, and creative discussions. If you have an idea to turn into a solution, reach out via email, phone, or social.

hero.heading: Who am I?
hero.name: Zoran Knežević
hero.tagline: IT expert with 20+ years connecting infrastructure, design, and architecture of complex systems. I develop modern software solutions from the first line of code, integrating decades of experience with cutting-edge technologies.
hero.story: It all started in 2005 on the MyCity.rs forum, where I entered the IT world through Linux and server configurations. Today, I independently design and develop complete web, desktop, and mobile solutions, turning every idea into a stable and professional product.

pillars.title: Value-First
pillars.desc: Practical solutions that solve real problems

pillars.title: Flexible Approach
pillars.desc: From idea to production, with the right tools

pillars.title: All Types of Web Applications
pillars.desc: I build complex web applications: e-commerce platforms, SaaS solutions, dashboard applications, PWAs, real-time systems, API integrations, and custom enterprise solutions

skills.heading: Technical Skills
skills.intro: I use a modern technology stack to develop robust and scalable solutions. Each skill is the result of years of work on real projects where I control every aspect of the development process.
skills.toolboxIntro: Essential tools and services I use for deployment, database management, and automation

projects.heading: Portfolio
projects.intro: Every project below is the result of my independent work, where I develop each solution from scratch - from database design to the final user interface. I focus on creating authentic platforms that solve real business challenges.

banner.message: This is just a small sample of my projects. I also have several complete platforms built from scratch. If you're interested in learning more about these solutions, feel free to contact me.

items.title: Travel
items.description: Comprehensive travel platform featuring 80+ best websites for flights, accommodation, transport, and activities in one place. Organized by categories with detailed reviews and links to providers.

items.title: Courses
items.description: Educational platform for online courses and learning resources. Centralized place to access quality educational content and courses.

items.title: German Language Learning Platform
items.description: Comprehensive platform for learning German language with interactive lessons, exercises, tests, and progress tracking. Features personalized courses, grading system, interactive digital tutor, achievements system, leaderboard, and detailed learning analytics.

items.title: Računi
items.description: Offline-first PWA for scanning fiscal receipts, storing warranties, and tracking household spending. I lead the product vision, Supabase sync architecture, and advanced OCR/analytics experiences.

items.title: Osnovci
items.description: Holistic learning platform for elementary students combining mastery-based lessons, parent dashboards, and digital coaching. I architect the multi-tenant curriculum CMS, real-time classroom automations, and progress analytics.

items.title: Balkan Remote
items.description: Career hub for remote talent from the Balkans: tax calculator, job aggregator, resources, tools, and a Q&A forum.

items.title: Pumpaj Video Downloader
items.description: Video downloader orchestrated independently from scratch using Next.js client, Express API, and Electron shell. Supports 100+ platforms and shows real-time progress.

items.title: SEF eInvoices
items.description: Complete e-invoicing system for the Serbian SEF. Solo project where I handle architecture, integrations, QA, and complete coding (dashboard, UBL 2.1, API, webhooks, audit trail),

items.title: PDF Scraper
items.description: Open-source tool for indexing PDF documents - independently developed concept, automation, and orchestration of all scrape routines and localized UI.

items.title: MMA Balkan
items.description: Regional hub for the MMA community with news, events, and corporate partnerships. My role: architecture, development of automated ingest pipelines, and full technical realization.

items.title: eFina
items.description: Fintech solution for the Croatian market: e-invoices, fiscalization, and a cash-flow dashboard. I led product discovery, architecture, and full integration of all modules.

items.title: SNS Scandals List
items.description: Database with over 324 recorded or reported scandals and affairs. Visual representation of estimated damage, categorization by areas, and search and filter capabilities.

items.title: Public Twitter Bot Accounts Database
items.description: Public database of Twitter bot accounts. Transparent platform for accessing information about bot accounts and their activity.

items.title: Rade Cosic Books
items.description: E-commerce platform for book sales with modern design and user experience. Implemented with focus on simple navigation and fast book search.

items.title: David Knežević Portfolio
items.description: Premium fitness coaching portfolio with personalized programs, client success stories, and comprehensive training information. Modern design focused on conversion and professional image.

items.title: Nestašica
items.description: Satirical data hub that imagines shortages and responses tied to potential sanctions on NIS in Serbia. I use it as a parody dashboard showing how transparent alerts, filters, and narratives could look.

items.title: Filmovi & Serije
items.description: Curated catalogue of movies and TV shows with genre-based recommendations, watchlist support, and detailed content cards-ideal for discovering new titles and sharing picks.

items.title: Vremenska Prognoza
items.description: Modern Next.js 16 web application for tracking weather forecasts and air quality in the Balkans with real-time data from multiple sources. Features 7-day forecasts, interactive maps, AQI monitoring, and smart alerts.

items.title: Brojac Vozila
items.description: Vehicle counting application for tracking and analyzing traffic data with real-time monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Pisma
items.description: Digital platform for time-locked letters that combines modern technology with the nostalgia of handwritten correspondence. Features personalized wax seals, audio messages, vintage paper effects, QR code tracking, and 3D unboxing experience.

items.title: Sipka Group
items.description: Premium website for property investment group in New Zealand. Features property portfolio, company history, and available spaces with modern design and interactive maps.

items.title: Ketering Beograd
items.description: Exclusive catering service for corporate events and private celebrations in Belgrade. Website with menus, food gallery, personalized offers, and multi-language support (Serbian, English, Russian).

items.title: Bidon
items.description: Modern PWA application for tracking and recording fuel dispensing from tanks. Ideal for agricultural farms and transport companies. Features tank management with animated fuel level display, vehicle records, consumption reports by vehicle and sector, and PWA support for mobile installation.

items.title: Block Manager for Twitter/X
items.description: Chrome extension for managing blocked users on Twitter/X platform. Modern glassmorphism UI with dark/light themes, Alt+B shortcut for quick blocking, advanced manager with search and filtering, visual statistics, smart tagging, and backup system. Supports import/export and bulk actions.

items.title: IPTV Platform
items.description: Free IPTV experience with over 1000 channels globally, including the EX-YU region. Features multi-language support, real-time channel search, and a personalized favorites list.

items.title: Travel Planner
items.description: A comprehensive travel planner for the Balkan region featuring a distance calculator, AI-powered route planning, and support for various vehicle types (cars, motorcycles, trucks).

items.title: Short-term Rental - House of Mirrors
items.description: Premium portfolio for the 4-star 'House of Mirrors' luxury apartment in Belgrade. Showcases a high-end gallery, amenities, house rules, and allows direct bookings.

items.title: Njata Shiz - Handcrafted Jewelry
items.description: Exclusive platform for handcrafted leather jewelry. Features interactive collection galleries, brand background story, and a detailed look at the crafting process.

items.title: Sipka Group - Available Spaces
items.description: Premium commercial and industrial property management platform for leasing spaces across New Zealand. Features interactive property listings with multiple view modes, advanced search, and integrated property brochures.

contact.intro: I’m open to collaboration, consulting, and brainstorming. If you have an idea to turn into a solution, reach out via email, phone, or social.
